comment: I took her 4 week summer course. Easiest class. Discussion boards, two short papers, and the final. Not a tough grader if you put forth the effort

Easiest 7 week course ever. The only the is she doesnt grade any papers until the very last Day before grades are due which could be annoying, but overall, great respected professor. 2 two page papers, 2 one page reflections, and 4 discussion post with response to two peers, easy A. Good luck.

Dr. Scott was an incredible professor. Truly, if you get a chance to take her, do it. Her feedback was AMAZING for an online class. I liked her class/did so well that I asked for a letter of recommendation for grad school! Her class is not necessarily easy; however, if you do the work and put in effort, you'll do well. TAKE HER! She's awesome.

I took Professor Scott for a 7 week session. It was pretty easy, although towards the end there was a paper due almost every week. Professor Scott is really nice and as long as you do your work, you should be fine.

I took this class online, and I thought it was pretty nice. This is my third class based around feminism for KSU, so a lot of the material was simple to understand. The professor gives clear grading criteria. As long as you try your best, you are sure to pass the class. She also responds quite quickly to emails, contact her if you need any help.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: Dr. Scott was one of the worst teachers I've ever had. She basically doesn't email back. Papers weren't graded for a month and a half. She gave notes/lecture slides twice, and they were off. The textbook is so out of date, the most recent event was the 2008 primaries. She wouldn't open weekly modules until Wednesday. This class was a nightmare.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: Take her!! I took Professor Scott for a 7 week session and it was the easiest class I've ever taken. Clear expectations on assignments and easy grader. 100s on every assignment except for the final which I got a high A on.

Dr. Scott is great! She is clear and prompt with her expectations and grades. The class is taught from the book and her power points -- 5 discussion posts, 3 case studies (of your choosing), and a final exam. As this was the 7 week version of the course, I was constantly reading (which I really didn't mind). Its an easy class for heavy readers!

Second class I've taken with Dr. Scott, first full online class I've taken. Dr. Scott is amazing! She posts videos every week explaining tasks and assignments for the class, which is a nice personal touch. Class consisted of 5 discussion posts, 3 papers, and a final exam, all pretty straightforward and simple. I'd definitely recommend this class!
rating_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring--Would take again

comment: Dr. Scott is wonderful! One of the nicest and best profs I've ever had at KSU. I wish this class met twice a week because I loved going. Not many grades- a few papers, a group project, and some D2L reflections- all easy. Participate, and you will get a lot out of this class. Taking her again next semester for ethics. I highly recommend her!
Took Ethics in Leadership as  7 week course, 5 discussion board post, 3 papers, and a final. Do the work and it is an easy A. Dr. Scott is very friendly and lays out the course well.

I took this as a 4 week course in the summer. It was very manageable. She was kind of a slow grader considering this was short a short course, but she outline exactly what we needed to do, when it was due, and how it would be graded. I enjoyed the class and would definitely recommend taking her if you can!

I enjoyed this online course.  Easy A if you read the powerpoints & participate in the online discussions.  She included a video introducing herself which I liked -  nice to put a face with a name.  I would gladly take another course with Dr. Scott.

I took this as an online Summer 4 week class. Very Very easy. Maybe took up 1-2hrs of my time a week. I rented the book but I think her powerpoints are from the book and have a lot of info on them, you'd be okay without the book it just makes it easier. . Only negative is she never posts the stuff on time when it is supposed to be available.
She like that cool aunt everybody loves! She knows her stuff!

This professor is a sweet heart. I took her classes in person and online. I got an A in both. Easy grader. Don't be lazy to do your work. Really friendly and helpful. Can boost your GPA. Doesn't always answer emails so may have to send several. Other than that all her classes are a piece of cake. Love her!!
This professor is non existent in her online class. Her class is easy, but she is the worst online professor I have had and has terrible communication. I would definitely not recommend her to others.

So easy. Discussions every week that are graded, quizzes are optional. 1 paper, 1 voice thread, 2 tests. Never opened a book, all the info you need is in her power points or on the internet. Always answers emails and is super understanding with late work. Definitely recommend her.

I had her online, she gives weekly discussion board posts which are easy 100's. We had a voicethread project that was pretty easy and a 5 page paper. Tests are not bad. She had a positive attitude and was very nice. I would take her again.

Dr Scott is very dedicated to helping her students succeed. Her class is fun and up-beat, there are many opportunities for participation. There are usually 2 projects per semester, 1 as a group and 1 individual. When you use her grading rubric to organize your project you are going to do very well. She is very approachable and easy to work with.

I seriously can't say enough good things about Dr. Scott!! She is engaging, enthusiastic, and it's truly a pleasure to attend her classes! She doesn't bother you with busy work and focuses more on concepts and relating things to real life. I wish more professors were like her and I have happily taken all of the leadership courses she teaches!

Dr. Scott is a Great teacher!! Loved her class!! Doesn't use book much but you still need it. She is very interesting and funny. Very laid back also. I would take every one of her classes if I could. She's the best thing to happen at Kennesaw State Univ.  Even though she went to UGA. She really cares about the students and the topics in LDR3700.

She opens each week on Mon. and expects everything due by Fri. On week 2 she didn't open the week until Wed. and then acted as if the students were too dumb to find that weeks content, no apologies to us and our assignments were still due Friday. For our final exam she said it would be open Friday and close Tuesday, its Saturday and its not open...

Took this class as a paymaster and it was the best decision I have ever made. Professor Scott is one of the sweetest women I have ever met, she is understanding and wants to see you succeed. If anything take all leadership classes with her!
Took class online during a 4 week session. Very easy as long as you do your work! Very nice and helpful. I would take her again!
